message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can only afford to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this price?

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $20,000 is really my bottom line.  Knowing how valuable it would be for you, I'm willing to let it go for $18,000.  I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but unfortunately, I am still not able to meet the price of $18,000. I am willing to pay up to $15,000 for the product. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?
